buttonColor.description: Color of the button. Default primary

buttonIcon.description: Button icon. Will be used if useFirstLinkAsDefault = false;

buttonLabel.description: Button label. Will be used if useFirstLinkAsDefault = false;

buttonSize.description: Size of the button. Allowed values are sm or md. Default md

navigationItems.description: An array of objects representing the navigation menu items.

position.description: The position of the dropdown, position will be picked in order of feasibility

showNavigation.description: Determines whether or not to show the navigation section.

useFirstLinkAsDefault.description: Determines whether or not to use the first link as the default target.
